Message:
I wanted to go to
where Big Sis was,

but a huge mountain
of ice blocked my path.

That’s when I met
the nice Duke.

His curse dissolving staff
helped us climb to the summit,
and there, we saw Big Sis...

who had become
a Witch of Qlipha.

Big Sis would never hurt a fly...
How could she...?

All of a sudden,
the ice started
showing us her memories.

The Inquisition’s torture methods
were far crueler than the rumors
made them out to be,

and Big Sis’s heart broke
from the pain.

That’s how the Curse that
freezes everything was born.

For them to do such
horrible things to you...

Just you wait, Big Sis.
I’m coming to save you.
